name: netatalk-timemachine
long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Downloads netatalk package at http://www.mikepalmer.net/files/netatalk_2.2.1-1_amd64.deb and sets up Apple talk as described in the blog post http://www.mikepalmer.net/build-a-netatalk-time-machine-for-osx-lion-using-debian-6-0-squeeze/
description: Installs netatalk package on Debian so it can be used with TimeMachine
